text: Om is an Indian film and television actor who works in Indian Bengali films and Bangladeshi films and television shows. His first acting role in a film was Arjun – Kalimpong E Sitaharan which was released in 2013. ==Career== Om started his career by modeling and television appearances. He was a participant of Fata Fati Filmy Fight ( A Reality Show of ETV Bangla). He gained popularity in the television series Alor Basha. He made his feature film acting debut in Arjun – Kalimpong E Sitaharan Times of India Retrieved 2016-7-29 as the title character Arjun, a young detective. He followed this with the 2014 film Action directed by Sayantan Mukherjee and co-starring Barkha Bisht Sengupta. In 2015, he starred in the box office hit film Agnee 2 with Mahiya Mahi. Om starred in three films in 2016: Angaar, Times of India Retrieved 2016-7-30 Hero 420, Clickittefaq Retrieved 2016-7-30 and Prem Ki Bujhini gdn8 Retrieved 2016-7-30 with Subhashree Ganguly. ==Filmography== Television * Alor Basha Films {| class="wikitable sortable" |- !
